item.description: Wood-elven Cleric of the Raven Queen ![[Pasted image 20221209174702.png]] Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[The Bean Bois/Avaaros]], [[The Bean Bois/Davaelor]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], [[Runa]], and [[The Bean Bois/Tia]] and, newly also [[Sealion]] Cleric of the [[People & Groups/Raven Queen]]
